peregrine.io.partition
Interface PartitionWriterDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePartitionWriterDelegate, LocalPartitionWriterDelegate, RemotePartitionWriterDelegate
public interface PartitionWriterDelegate

Delegates performing the actual IO to a given subsystem. Local or remote.
